mapper.select: select t.room_id roomId,t.room_seq roomSeq,t.room_name roomName,a.exam_date examDate, a.start_time startTime,a.end_time endTime,a.grade_id gradeId,a.subject_id,b.name subjectName, c.teacher_id teacherId,c.name teacherName,c.teacher_no teacherNo from t_exam_room_allocate t left join t_exam_arrange a on t.arrange_id=a.arrange_id left join t_subject b on a.subject_id=b.subject_id left join t_teacher c on t.teacher_id=c.teacher_id where a.exam_id=#{0} order by a.exam_date,a.start_time,a.grade_id,t.room_seq
mapper.update: update t_exam_room_allocate t set t.teacher_id=null where t.arrange_id in (select a.arrange_id from t_exam_arrange a where a.exam_id=#{0} )
update t_exam_room_allocate t set t.teacher_id=#{1} where t.room_id=#{0}
